title: A STORY OF THE RUSSIAN FAMINE. BY OCTAVE THANET.

book.title: Harper's Round Table, November 24, 1896
book.description: 简介： The Editor of the Round Table has asked me to relate some incident of my life which may be of interest to its readers. Will they permit me to tell them that episode in my life which gives me, when I recall it, the greatest pleasure?It is the old stor...
